items.name: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold
items.detail: The Galaxy Z Fold features a foldable display with a durable hinge. It provides an unparalleled multi-tasking experience.

items.name: Apple MacBook Pro
items.detail: This MacBook Pro is equipped with the M1 chip for powerful performance. It is perfect for creative professionals.

items.name: Sony WH-1000XM5
items.detail: Experience industry-leading noise cancellation with the Sony WH-1000XM5. These over-ear headphones deliver high-quality sound.

items.name: Garmin Venu 2
items.detail: The Garmin Venu 2 is a fitness-focused smartwatch with advanced health monitoring features. It is water-resistant and stylish.

items.name: Apple iPad Pro 12.9
items.detail: The iPad Pro 12.9 features a Liquid Retina XDR display and supports Apple Pencil for unmatched productivity.

items.name: JBL Charge 5
items.detail: The JBL Charge 5 delivers powerful sound and doubles as a power bank. It has IP67 water and dust resistance.

items.name: Canon EOS R5
items.detail: The Canon EOS R5 is a full-frame mirrorless camera offering 8K video recording and exceptional photo quality.

items.name: Panasonic Microwave NN-SN966S
items.detail: This microwave oven provides 1250W cooking power for quick and even heating. It comes with an easy-to-use control panel.

items.name: LG French Door Refrigerator
items.detail: With a large capacity, this LG refrigerator offers more space for your groceries. It has smart features and is energy-efficient.

items.name: Vitamix 5200 Blender
items.detail: The Vitamix 5200 is a high-performance blender perfect for smoothies, soups, and sauces. It has variable speed control.

items.name: Honeywell Portable Air Conditioner
items.detail: This portable air conditioner cools large rooms quickly. It features an easy installation kit and a washable filter.

items.name: Bosch 300 Series Dishwasher
items.detail: The Bosch 300 Series Dishwasher provides quiet operation and excellent cleaning power. It is Energy Star certified.

items.name: De'Longhi Magnifica Coffee Machine
items.detail: This coffee machine offers a built-in grinder and frother, perfect for espresso and cappuccino lovers.

items.name: The Great Gatsby
items.detail: F. Scott Fitzgerald's classic novel, The Great Gatsby, explores themes of wealth, love, and the American Dream.

items.name: A Brief History of Time
items.detail: Stephen Hawking explains the origins of the universe in this widely read science book. A must-read for curious minds.

items.name: The Diary of a Young Girl
items.detail: The Diary of Anne Frank offers a poignant look at the Holocaust through the eyes of a young Jewish girl in hiding.

items.name: Meditations
items.detail: Marcus Aurelius' personal reflections on Stoic philosophy offer timeless wisdom for living a life of virtue.

items.name: The Lord of the Rings Box Set
items.detail: J.R.R. Tolkien's legendary fantasy series comes in a beautifully packaged box set, including all three books.

items.name: Nike Air Force 1
items.detail: The Nike Air Force 1 is a timeless sneaker, known for its classic design and comfort.

items.name: Levi's 501 Original Jeans
items.detail: Levi's 501 jeans offer a classic fit and durable design, ideal for casual wear.

items.name: Ray-Ban Aviator Sunglasses
items.detail: These iconic sunglasses feature a lightweight frame and UV protection, perfect for any season.

items.name: Adidas Ultraboost Running Shoes
items.detail: The Adidas Ultraboost shoes provide superior cushioning and support, making them perfect for running and everyday wear.

items.name: Gucci GG Marmont Bag
items.detail: This luxury shoulder bag from Gucci features the signature GG logo and fine craftsmanship.
